nodes.text: The Wyrd were an order of Force-sensitive Tarasin and other races who drew their power from the dark side of the Force. They were active during the Clone Wars, and many saw them as allies of the Sith. They were periodically attacked by the Jedi, but the Wyrd were always replenished in their ranks. The Wyrd increasingly came under the influence of the Believers and, after suffering a lot of setbacks, were stirred up into making an attempt to turn the Ch'hala tree to the dark side of the Force and gain control of the Cularin ecology. However, they failed to do this, and many of them were killed in the attempt.
It was believed that the Jedi Purge would have allowed the Wyrd complete control of the planet Cularin.
